class.name: SamplePlayer2D
class.description: Sample player for positional 2D Sound. Plays sound samples positionally, left and right depending on the distance/place on the screen.

method.name: get_polyphony
method.description: Return the polyphony of the player.

method.name: get_random_pitch_scale
method.description: Return the amplitude used for random pitch scale variations.

method.name: get_sample_library
method.description: Return the sample library used by the player.

method.name: is_voice_active
method.description: Return whether a voice is still active or has stopped playing.

method.name: play
method.description: Play a sample. An internal polyphony ID can optionally be passed, or defaults to NEXT_VOICE. Return a voice ID which can be used to modify the voice parameters, or INVALID_VOICE if the voice or sample are invalid.

method.name: set_polyphony
method.description: Set the polyphony of the player (maximum amount of simultaneous voices).

method.name: set_random_pitch_scale
method.description: Set the amplitude for random pitch scale variations. If different from zero, the pitch scale will vary randomly around 1.0 in a range defined by val. The actual pitch scale will be, with "variation" ranging from -val to val: * variation > 0: 1.0 + variation * variation < 0: 1.0/(1.0 - variation)

method.name: set_sample_library
method.description: Set the sample library for the player.

method.name: voice_set_pitch_scale
method.description: Change the pitch scale of a currently playing voice.

method.name: voice_set_volume_scale_db
method.description: Change the volume scale (in dB) of a currently playing voice.

constants.constant: Value returned if the voice or sample are invalid.
Default voice for the play method. Corresponds to the first voice following the last used voice.
